name: Question Blast (free version)
description:
The magic, adventure and challenenge is Now FREE. it is no a simple game it es a real challenge.  The adventure has no limits and you will not have much time start the game now!.

Specialized application for training diferent test preparation like SAT test, pre-University test, a any other multiple choice question test and for fun, to test time, concentration, and for fun. System Requirements Android 9 o later 3 GB Ram disk 300MB.
